column1: Smoque BBQ////My BF ordered ribs with the brisket chili and mac & cheese
column2: I ordered the chicken with corn bread and mac & cheese. They really are sides
column4: which is fine. The sauce is VERY VERY VERY sweet
column6: 20 sugars dumped in per serving sweet. The chicken was fine
column9: far from the best we've had
column10: but certainly not the worst...just meh. The main dishes were just...fine. Nothing to write home about
column11: at all. Maybe they'd have tasted better if they hadn't been (barely) luke-warm. The sides were excellent
column12: and I wish they were available as their own entrees. My boyfriend completely devoured their coleslaw (I'm not a fan of coleslaw in general)
column13: so that's also a plus in terms of sides (and comes included).
